trans-unit.source: Represents a row in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項中的資料列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> class represents a row in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>類別表示中的資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve rows through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A> collections of the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擷取資料列的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A>控制項的集合。

trans-unit.source: Unlike a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> physically contains a collection of all of the cells in that row.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>實際包含的所有該資料列中的資料格集合。

trans-unit.source: You can access this collection through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過此集合的存取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> class is used to access the individual cell elements, as well as to adjust the appearance and behavior of the row user interface (UI), such as height and cell style.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>類別用來存取個別資料格元素，以及有關調整的外觀和行為的資料列的使用者介面 (UI)，例如高度和儲存格樣式。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you will want all rows or most rows in the control to share the same characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您會想要共用相同特性的控制項中的大部分資料列或是所有資料列。

trans-unit.source: To set cell styles for all rows in the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定控制項中的所有資料列的儲存格樣式，設定所傳回的物件屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To set styles for alternating rows, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定替代資料列的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell styles, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需儲存格樣式的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to define a row that will be used as a basis for all rows added to the control.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性來定義將用於做為基礎的所有資料列加入至控制項的資料列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control will share <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> objects across multiple data rows whenever possible to avoid performance penalties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項就會共用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>跨多個資料列盡可能以避免效能的負面影響的物件。

trans-unit.source: Unless you are working with large amounts of data and experiencing performance issues, you can typically ignore row sharing.
trans-unit.target: 除非您正在使用大量的資料而產生效能問題，您通常可以忽略共用資料列。

trans-unit.source: A shared row is indicated by an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> property value of -1.
trans-unit.target: 共用的資料列會以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>屬性值為-1。

trans-unit.source: Some members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> class cannot be used with shared rows, but you can unshare a row by accessing it through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Item%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 某些成員<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>類別不能與共用的資料列，但您可以藉由存取透過取消共用一個資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Item%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Rows can also become unshared in other ways.
trans-unit.target: 資料列可能也會變成未以其他方式共用。

trans-unit.source: To access a row without unsharing it, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.SharedRow%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取的資料列，而不取消它，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.SharedRow%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: When working with large amounts of data, you should be aware of how rows are shared and unshared to avoid performance penalties.
trans-unit.target: 當使用大量的資料，您應該知道如何共用和取消共用，以避免效能的負面影響資料列。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個型別。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 處理 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: When you derive from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Clone" /> method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.
trans-unit.target: 當您衍生自<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />並將新屬性加入衍生的類別，請務必覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Clone" />方法，以便於複製作業期間複製新屬性。

trans-unit.source: You should also call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Clone" /> method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.
trans-unit.target: 您也應該呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Clone" />方法，讓基底類別的內容複製到新的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> class without using a template.
trans-unit.target: 在不使用樣板下，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the row in its blank state.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會初始化空白狀態中的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" /> assigned to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定給 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" /> assigned to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定給 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />。

trans-unit.source: To control the instance returned from this method, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制從這個方法傳回的執行個體，請覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前沒有為控制項指定 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>，則會建立其新的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AccessibilityObject%2A>屬性，您必須加入參考`Accessibility`隨安裝組件[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: For more information about accessible objects, see the "Active Accessibility" section of the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: 如需可存取物件的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 的 「 Active Accessibility"區段[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> that represents the row header border style to modify.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />，表示要修改的資料列行首框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> that is used to store intermediate changes to the row header border style.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />，用來儲存對資料列行首框線樣式所做的中繼變更。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to add a single vertical border to the result; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要在所產生的結果上加入單垂直框線，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to add a single horizontal border to the result; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要在所產生的結果上加入單水平框線，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the row is the first row displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料列是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中所顯示的第一個資料列，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the row is the last row in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that has its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible" /> property set to <see langword="true" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的資料列是將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="true" /> 之 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible" /> 中的最後一個資料列，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Modifies an input row header border style according to the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: 根據指定的準則，修改輸入資料列行首框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> that represents the new border style used.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />，表示所使用的新框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control internally calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AdjustRowHeaderBorderStyle%2A> method to determine the appearance of the borders for the row header cells.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制在內部呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AdjustRowHeaderBorderStyle%2A>方法，以判斷資料列標題儲存格的框線外觀。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control typically uses the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property for the `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項通常會使用值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>屬性`dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput`參數。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AdjustRowHeaderBorderStyle%2A> method to customize the borders of the row header cells.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AdjustRowHeaderBorderStyle%2A>方法，以自訂的資料列標題儲存格框線。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle>類別。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you want to customize the appearance of the borders of row header cells.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，如果您想要自訂的資料列的標頭儲存格的框線外觀。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of cells that populate the row.
trans-unit.target: 取得填入資料列的儲存格集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> that contains all of the cells in the row.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" />，包含資料列中的所有儲存格。

trans-unit.source: If the row does not contain any cells when this property is accessed, a new empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection> will be created by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.CreateCellsInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料列不包含任何資料格，存取這個屬性時，新的空白<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection>將建立呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.CreateCellsInstance%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A> property to set the value of a cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>屬性來設定資料列中的資料格的值。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger code example provided in [How to: Manipulate Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大程式碼範例的一部分[如何： 處理 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this row.
trans-unit.target: 建立與這個資料列完全相同的複本。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the cloned <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示複製的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Clone%2A> method copies the row and its property values, but does not copy the cell values that the row contains.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Clone%2A>方法的資料列複製和其屬性值，但不會複製資料格的資料列包含的值。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to copy cell values when cloning a row, see the example section.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何複製資料格的值，在複製資料列時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節。

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Clone%2A> method whenever you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> and add new properties to the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Clone%2A>方法，每當您衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>並將新屬性加入至衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Clone%2A> method to copy a row, and then populate the copy with the cell values from the original row.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Clone%2A>方法來複製資料列，並於其中填入與從原始的資料列的資料格值的複本。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Clone" /> in a derived class, call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Clone" /> method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new row, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Clone" />衍生類別中呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Clone" />方法，讓基底類別的內容會複製到新的資料列，並確定也將複製的值加入至衍生類別的任何屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu for the row.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料列的捷徑功能表。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" /> associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" />，與目前的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> 相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the shortcut menu that is displayed when the user right-clicks the row unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event or the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會指出當使用者在除非，按一下滑鼠右鍵在資料列會顯示快顯功能表<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>事件或資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>屬性會覆寫已按下的特定資料格的捷徑功能表。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`, getting the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event of the control and returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property as specified in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>屬性設定或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性是`true`，取得的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>屬性引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>控制項的事件並傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性設為指定的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: If there are no handlers for the event, getting the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property returns the previously specified value or its default value of `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件沒有處理常式時，取得的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>屬性會傳回先前指定的值或其預設值`null`。

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event is primarily useful when working with large amounts of data to avoid performance penalties when setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件時，主要是使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響，設定資料列時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>多個資料列的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Changing this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged> event on the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: 變更這個屬性會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged>上擁有事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: If the current row is shared, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.GetContextMenuStrip%2A> method rather than getting the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前資料列所共用，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.GetContextMenuStrip%2A>方法，而不是取得這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which is nearly identical to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，這是幾乎完全相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>類別。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger code example provided in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大程式碼範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>類別。

trans-unit.source: When getting the value of this property, the row is in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時，資料列是位於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項中，而且是共用的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessible object for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> 建立新的可存取物件。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" /> 的新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />。

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有明確呼叫 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> 方法，將會在參考 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AccessibilityObject%2A> 屬性時呼叫該方法。

trans-unit.source: To get or set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AccessibilityObject%2A>, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AccessibilityObject%2A>，您必須加入參考`Accessibility`隨安裝組件[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Resets the cells in the row.
trans-unit.target: 重設資料列中的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that acts as a template for cell styles.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />，做為儲存格樣式的樣板。

trans-unit.source: Clears the existing cells and sets their template according to the supplied <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> template.
trans-unit.target: 清除現有儲存格，並根據所提供的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 樣板，設定其樣板。

trans-unit.source: This method clears the row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection> and reinitializes it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property of each column of the `dataGridView` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會清除的資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection>並重新初始化其與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A>的每個資料行屬性`dataGridView`參數。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the row adopts the appearance and behavior of a row from the `dataGridView` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，資料列採用的外觀和行為的資料列`dataGridView`參數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dataGridView" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataGridView" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A row that already belongs to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> was added.
trans-unit.target: 加入本來就屬於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的資料列。

trans-unit.source: -or-
A column that has no cell template was added.
trans-unit.target: 未加入儲存格樣板的資料行。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that acts as a template for cell styles.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />，做為儲存格樣式的樣板。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects that initialize the reset cells.
trans-unit.target: 初始化重設儲存格的物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: Clears the existing cells and sets their template and values.
trans-unit.target: 清除現有儲存格並設定其範本和值。

trans-unit.source: This method clears the row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection> and reinitializes it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property of each column of the `dataGridView` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會清除的資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection>並重新初始化其與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A>的每個資料行屬性`dataGridView`參數。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the row adopts the appearance and behavior of a row from the `dataGridView` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，資料列採用的外觀和行為的資料列`dataGridView`參數。

trans-unit.source: If there are more elements in the `values` array than cells to be initialized, the extra elements will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多個項目中的`values`陣列超過要初始化的資料格，將會忽略額外的項目。

trans-unit.source: If there are fewer elements than required, the remaining unmatched cells will retain their default initial values.
trans-unit.target: 如果有較少超出必要的元件，剩下不相符的儲存格將會保留其預設的初始值。

trans-unit.source: Either of the parameters is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 兩個參數都是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A row that already belongs to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> was added.
trans-unit.target: 加入本來就屬於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的資料列。

trans-unit.source: -or-
A column that has no cell template was added.
trans-unit.target: 未加入儲存格樣板的資料行。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new collection of cells based on this row.
trans-unit.target: 根據這個資料列建構新的儲存格集合。

trans-unit.source: The newly created <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 新建立的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: This method creates an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection.Count%2A> property set to 0.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會建立空<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection>與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection.Count%2A>屬性設定為 0。

trans-unit.source: Typically, derived classes should implement their own version of the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.CreateCellsInstance" /> method and not call the base class version.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，衍生的類別應該實作自己的版本<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.CreateCellsInstance" />方法，並呼叫基底類別版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data-bound object that populated the row.
trans-unit.target: 取得填入資料列的資料繫結物件。

trans-unit.source: The data-bound <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Accessing data-bound objects directly through row objects is useful when you do not have direct access to the data source containing the objects.
trans-unit.target: 直接透過資料列物件中存取資料繫結物件時，您不必直接存取資料來源包含的物件。

trans-unit.source: It is also convenient when you want to manipulate objects bound to selected rows or to rows passed as arguments to event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 它時也是方便您想要管理繫結到選取的資料列或資料列做為引數傳遞給事件處理常式的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataBoundItem%2A> property to access a business object bound to a row.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataBoundItem%2A>屬性來存取商務物件繫結至一個資料列。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Access Objects Bound to Windows Forms DataGridView Rows](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-access-objects-bound-to-windows-forms-datagridview-rows.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 存取物件繫結至 Windows Form DataGridView 資料列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-access-objects-bound-to-windows-forms-datagridview-rows.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default styles for the row, which are used to render cells in the row unless the styles are overridden.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料列的預設樣式，可用來呈現資料列中的儲存格 (除非覆寫該樣式)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> to be applied as the default style.
trans-unit.target: 要套用為預設樣式的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property, which inherits styles from other properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項會顯示其使用由儲存格樣式的儲存格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>屬性，其他屬性的型別繼承樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>。

trans-unit.source: For cells in this row, the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property override the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties, but are overridden by the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 透過指定此資料列中的資料格，樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性覆寫透過指定的樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，但透過指定的樣式會覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: When getting this property, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性，當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>預設值將會建立值如果屬性已不被存取。

trans-unit.source: This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性的多個資料列時，這可能會造成效能影響。

trans-unit.source: Whenever possible, use a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> to set this property for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 您應該盡可能使用單一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>設定此屬性的多個資料列。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control intended primarily for display.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性來<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項主要是供顯示。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，自訂控制項的視覺外觀的數種方式，控制項設定為有限的互動性。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the row is in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 在設定這個屬性時，資料列位於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項中而且是一個共用資料列。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this row is displayed on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指定資料列是否顯示在螢幕上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the row is currently displayed on the screen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料列仍然顯示在螢幕上，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The row is in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 資料列位於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項中而且是一個共用資料列。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height, in pixels, of the row divider.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料列分割線的高度 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the divider (the row's bottom margin).
trans-unit.target: 分割線 (資料列的下方邊界) 的高度 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful to provide a visual boundary between frozen rows and rows that can scroll.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是非常適用於提供凍結的資料列及可捲動的資料列的視覺界限。

trans-unit.source: The extra edge is part of the current row, although it will take on the foreground color of the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 額外的邊屬於目前的資料列，雖然它會在相關聯的前景色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: The extra edge does not extend the area in which users can double-click to automatically resize a row.
trans-unit.target: 額外的邊不擴充的區域，使用者可以在其中按兩下自動調整大小的資料列。

trans-unit.source: To resize a row, the user must double-click on the boundary between the divider and the adjacent row.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小的資料列，使用者必須按兩下分割線與相鄰的資料列之間的界限。

trans-unit.source: The following code example modifies the height of a row's divider to provide emphasis.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會修改提供強調的資料列分割線的高度。

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the row is in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 在設定這個屬性時，資料列位於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項中而且是一個共用資料列。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to paint the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 繪製 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 所用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that needs to be painted.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示需要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 區域。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that contains the bounds of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，包含要繪製 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> 的界限。

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: 正在繪製的儲存格資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values that specifies the state of the row.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> 值的位元組合，指定資料列的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> used to paint the focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 繪製焦點矩形所用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor" /> property of <c>cellStyle</c> as the color of the focus rectangle; <see langword="false" /> to use the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor" /> property of <c>cellStyle</c> as the color of the focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要使用 <c>cellStyle</c> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor" /> 屬性作為焦點矩形的色彩；<see langword="false" /> 表示要使用 <c>cellStyle</c> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor" /> 屬性作為焦點矩形的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Draws a focus rectangle around the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的界限四周繪製焦點矩形 (Focus Rectangle)。

trans-unit.source: The `rowIndex` parameter is not used in the base-class implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DrawFocus%2A> method, although it can be used when overriding this method in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: `rowIndex`的基底類別實作中不使用參數<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DrawFocus%2A>方法中，雖然它時才能使用這個方法在衍生類別中的覆寫。

trans-unit.source: The row has not been added to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 資料列未加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="graphics" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

<paramref name="cellStyle" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="cellStyle" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message text for row-level errors.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料列層級錯誤的錯誤訊息文字。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the error message.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to provide an error message for row-level errors.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來提供資料列層級錯誤的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The specified message is displayed in a ToolTip when the user moves the mouse pointer over the error icon shown in the row header.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者將滑鼠指標移至資料列標頭顯示錯誤圖示上方時，會顯示在工具提示中指定的訊息。

trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 4.5.2，錯誤圖示會調整大小根據系統 DPI 設定時的 app.config 檔案包含下列項目：

trans-unit.source: If this row is associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, setting this property will raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個資料列聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制，設定這個屬性將會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: When getting the value of this property, the row is a shared row in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性值時，該資料列是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項中的共用資料列。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the row is frozen.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出資料列是否已凍結。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the row is frozen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料列已凍結，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property lets you keep one or several rows of important information in place when a user scrolls through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您保留在原位的重要資訊的一或多個資料列，當使用者捲動<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: All rows above the frozen row are also frozen.
trans-unit.target: 凍結的資料列的上方的所有資料列也會凍結。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Frozen%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which is nearly identical to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Frozen%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> class.

trans-unit.source: If the row is shared, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> is -1, which is an invalid value for `rowIndex`.
trans-unit.target: 如果共用的資料列，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>為-1，這是無效的值為`rowIndex`。

trans-unit.source: The row belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 資料列屬於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項而且是共用資料列。

trans-unit.source: The row belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control and <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the control minus one.
trans-unit.target: 這個資料列屬於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項，而且 <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 小於零或大於控制項中的資料列數減一。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row whose preferred height is calculated.
trans-unit.target: 已計算慣用高度的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode" /> that specifies an automatic sizing mode.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode" />，指定自動調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to calculate the preferred height for a fixed cell width; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要計算固定儲存格寬度的慣用高度，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the ideal height of the specified row based on the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: 根據指定的準則，計算資料列的理想高度。

trans-unit.source: The ideal height of the row, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 資料列的理想高度，單位為像素。

trans-unit.source: This property is used by the content-based automatic sizing feature of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to determine the ideal height of a row.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性由以內容為基礎的自動調整大小功能使用的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項來決定資料列的理想高度。

trans-unit.source: The `rowIndex` value lets you specify the actual row index of a shared row.
trans-unit.target: `rowIndex`值可讓您指定共用的資料列的實際資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: (Shared rows have <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> property values of -1.)
trans-unit.target: (共用資料列的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>屬性值為-1。)

trans-unit.source: A `fixedWidth` parameter value of `false` calculates the row height based on calculated column widths that will achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios.
trans-unit.target: A`fixedWidth`參數值的`false`計算資料列高度，以達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例的導出資料行寬度為基礎。

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的內容分成多行換行，必須有作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>屬性值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需自動調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeRowMode" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row.
trans-unit.target: 資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating the current state of the row.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出資料列的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values indicating the row state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> 值的位元組合，指出資料列的狀態。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to determine the state of a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是有助於判斷共用的資料列的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Shared rows have <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> values of -1, which prevents you from using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.State%2A> property with shared rows.
trans-unit.target: 共用資料列的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>值為-1，讓您無法使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.State%2A>與共用資料列的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To use this method, pass in the actual row index.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用這個方法，傳入的實際資料列索引。

trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由呼叫擷取共用的資料列的實際索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The row has been added to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control, but the <paramref name="rowIndex" /> value is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 資料列已加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項，但 <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 值不在 0 到控制項中資料列數減 1 的有效範圍中。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The row has not been added to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control, but the <paramref name="rowIndex" /> value does not match the row's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index" /> property value.
trans-unit.target: 資料列尚未加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項，但 <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 值與資料列的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index" /> 屬性值不相符。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the row's header cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料列的行首儲存格。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" />，表示資料列的行首儲存格。

trans-unit.source: The header cell of a row is typically used to display a row label.
trans-unit.target: 資料列行首儲存格通常用於顯示資料列標籤。

trans-unit.source: Users can also click the row header to select the row if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.RowHeaderSelect?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者也可以按一下選取的資料列，如果資料列標頭<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.RowHeaderSelect?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.HeaderCell%2A>標籤資料列標頭的屬性。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料列的目前高度。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the row.
trans-unit.target: 資料列的高度 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: The default is the height of the default font plus 9 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是預設字型的高度加 9 個像素。

trans-unit.source: To set the minimum height for a row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.MinimumHeight%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的資料列的最小高度，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.MinimumHeight%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>屬性來設定第一個資料列的高度。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger code example provided in [How to: Manipulate Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大程式碼範例的一部分[如何： 處理 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the row is in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 在設定這個屬性時，資料列位於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項中而且是一個共用資料列。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cell style in effect for the row.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料列的作用中儲存格樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> that specifies the formatting and style information for the cells in the row.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />，指定資料列中儲存格的格式和樣式資訊。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful to determine which cell styles are applied to all cells in a row regardless of any column styles that are also applied to the cells.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是有助於判斷哪些儲存格樣式會套用至資料列，不論任何也會套用至資料格的資料行樣式中的所有資料格。

trans-unit.source: The row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A> property inherits its values from the following properties:
trans-unit.target: 資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A>屬性繼承自下列屬性的值：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> (for rows with odd index number)
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> （適用於具有奇數索引的資料列）

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需儲存格樣式繼承的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The row is in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 資料列位於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項中而且是一個共用資料列。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the row is the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出資料列是否為新記錄資料列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the row is the last row in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />, which is used for the entry of a new row of data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料列是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中最後一個資料列，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Because the row for new records is in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.IsNewRow%2A> property to determine whether a row is the row for new records or is a populated row.
trans-unit.target: 在新記錄的資料列，所以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>集合，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.IsNewRow%2A>屬性來判斷資料列是否為新的記錄資料列，或已擴展的資料列。

trans-unit.source: A row stops being the new row when data entry into the row begins.
trans-unit.target: 資料列就會停止資料至資料列的項目開始時，所新的資料列。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.IsNewRow%2A> property to prevent attempts to set the label of the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.IsNewRow%2A>屬性可防止嘗試設定新記錄的資料列的標籤。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum height of the row.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料列的最低高度。

trans-unit.source: The minimum row height in pixels, ranging from 2 to <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 資料列最低高度 (以像素為單位)，範圍從 2 到 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is 3.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 3。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.MinimumHeight%2A> property maintains the display of the row by setting a limit to how far the user can resize the row's height through the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.MinimumHeight%2A>屬性維護的資料列顯示設限制幅度可以調整大小的使用者透過使用者介面 (UI) 的資料列的高度。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.MinimumHeight%2A> property to set the minimum height of the second row.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.MinimumHeight%2A>屬性來設定第二個資料列的最小高度。

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the row is in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 在設定這個屬性時，資料列位於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項中而且是一個共用資料列。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than 2.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時的指定值小於 2。

trans-unit.target: 繪製 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 所用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that needs to be painted.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示需要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 區域。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，包含要繪製 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> 的界限。

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: 正在繪製的儲存格資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values that specifies the state of the row.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> 值的位元組合，指定資料列的狀態。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate whether the current row is the first row displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要指出目前資料列是否為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中所顯示的第一個資料列，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate whether the current row is the last row in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible" /> property set to <see langword="true" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Paints the current row.
trans-unit.target: 繪製目前的資料列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control calls this method to paint the row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項會呼叫此方法來繪製資料列。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: If a handler for the event does not set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true`, this method also calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.PaintHeader%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.PaintCells%2A> methods and raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件處理常式並不會設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性`true`，這個方法也會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.PaintHeader%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.PaintCells%2A>方法及引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項會呼叫此方法以繪製以外的資料列中的資料格時的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項會呼叫這個方法，以繪製時的處理常式的資料列標頭除了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.target: 資料列未加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the row is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出資料列是否為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the row is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性是唯讀，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ReadOnly%2A> property affects the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of each cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ReadOnly%2A>屬性會影響<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>資料列中的每個資料格的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property has no effect if the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果設定此屬性沒有任何作用的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which is nearly identical to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ReadOnly%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，這是幾乎完全相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ReadOnly%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>類別。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>類別。

trans-unit.source: The row is in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 資料列位於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項中而且是一個共用資料列。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether users can resize the row or indicating that the behavior is inherited from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeRows" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否能夠調整資料列的大小，或指出行為是從 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeRows" /> 屬性繼承的。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState" /> value that indicates whether the row can be resized or whether it can be resized only when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeRows" /> property is set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState" /> 值，指出資料列是否能夠重新調整大小，或是只有在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeRows" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="true" /> 時，才能調整大小。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this property with a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用這個屬性與共用的資料列。

trans-unit.source: For more information about shared rows, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關共用資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Resizable%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.False>, the user will not be able to manually adjust the row height.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Resizable%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.False>，使用者不能手動調整資料列高度。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Resizable%2A> property value is based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeRows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property value.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Resizable%2A>屬性值根據<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeRows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: If you explicitly set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Resizable%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.False>, however, the control value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果您明確地設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Resizable%2A>至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.False>，不過，則會忽略控制項值。

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Resizable%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.NotSet> to restore the value-inheritance behavior.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Resizable%2A>至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.NotSet>還原值繼承行為。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.NotSet> restores the value inheritance, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Resizable%2A> property will never return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.NotSet> value unless the row has not been added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.NotSet>還原繼承的值，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Resizable%2A>永遠不會傳回屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.NotSet>值，除非資料列尚未加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you need to determine whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Resizable%2A> property value of a row is inherited or has been specified explicitly, check its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要確定是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Resizable%2A>資料列的屬性值繼承，或已明確地指定檢查其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A> value includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates.ResizableSet> flag, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Resizable%2A> property value is not inherited.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>值包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates.ResizableSet>旗標，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Resizable%2A>不繼承屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the row is selected.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已選取資料列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the row is selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料列已選取則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this property with a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用這個屬性與共用的資料列。

trans-unit.source: For more information about shared rows, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關共用資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The row is in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 資料列位於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項中而且是一個共用資料列。

trans-unit.source: One or more objects that represent the cell values in the row.
trans-unit.target: 表示資料列中儲存格值的一或多個物件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of <see cref="T:System.Object" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 值的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the values of the row's cells.
trans-unit.target: 設定資料列之儲存格的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if all values have been set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已經設定所有值，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The `values` parameter represents a variable number of arguments used to populate cell values in the row.
trans-unit.target: `values`參數所代表的變數引數用來填入儲存格的資料列中的值數目。

trans-unit.source: These values can be passed to this method as multiple, individual arguments or as members of a single <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 這些值可以傳遞至這個方法，做為多個個別的引數，或做為成員的單一<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: Because the values are expected to be instances of type <xref:System.Object>, however, if you pass in an array of value-type values (such as <xref:System.Int32> values), this method will treat the array as a single object and assign it to a single cell.
trans-unit.target: 因為值應該是類型的執行個體<xref:System.Object>，不過，如果您傳遞實值型別值的陣列中 (例如<xref:System.Int32>值)，這個方法會視為單一物件的陣列，並將它指派給單一資料格。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this behavior, you must cast a value-type array to an <xref:System.Object> array or pass in multiple values as multiple arguments.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這個問題，您必須轉換至實值型別陣列<xref:System.Object>陣列或多個值做為多個引數中傳遞。

trans-unit.source: If there are more values in the `values` list than there are cells to be initialized, this method ignores the extra values and returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多個值中的`values`清單比初始化的儲存格，此方法會忽略額外的值，並傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: This method also returns `false` if any of the specified values cannot be set.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也會傳回`false`如果任何一個指定的值無法設定。

trans-unit.source: If there are fewer values than there are cells, the remaining unmatched cells retain their current values.
trans-unit.target: 如果有較少的值多於資料格，其餘不相符的資料格會保留其目前的值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="values" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="values" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> is operating in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: 當相關聯 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 是在虛擬模式下運作時，會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: -or-
This row is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 這個資料列是共用資料列。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the row.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料列的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values indicating the row state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> 值的位元組合，指出資料列的狀態。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this property with shared rows because shared rows do not store their state locally.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用這個屬性與共用資料列，因為共用資料列不會儲存其狀態儲存在本機中。

trans-unit.source: To get the state of a shared row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.GetState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得共用的資料列狀態，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.GetState%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The row is in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 資料列位於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項中而且是一個共用資料列。

trans-unit.source: Gets a human-readable string that describes the row.
trans-unit.target: 取得描述資料列之人們可讀取的 (Human-Readable) 字串。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes this row.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，描述這個資料列。

trans-unit.source: This overridden version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ToString%2A> method supplies the class name and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> information for this instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 此覆寫的版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ToString%2A>方法提供的類別名稱和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>的這個執行個體資訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the row is visible.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出資料列是否可見。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the row is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料列可見，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to hide a row from view while keeping the row in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來隱藏的資料列，同時保留資料列中檢視從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: To completely remove a row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Remove%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要完全移除資料列，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Remove%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Visible%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which is nearly identical to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Visible%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，這是幾乎完全相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>類別。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>類別。

trans-unit.source: The row is in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 資料列位於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項中而且是一個共用資料列。
